channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 观看：巴克莱首席执行官 CS Venkatakrishnan 宣布了一项重振其低迷股价的计划，其中包括对其运营部门进行调整，随后巴克莱股价最高上涨了 7% 。
item.description: WATCH: Barclays shares rose by as much as 7% after the announcement of a plan to revive its flagging share price, which also included a shake-up of its operating divisions, by Barclays CEO CS Venkatakrishnan reut.rs/49lix1g

item.title: Breakingviews - 标准普尔的 "可视阿尔法 "交易忽略了胖手指的缺陷
item.description: Breakingviews - S&P’s Visible Alpha deal ignores fat finger flubs reut.rs/3UNxG73 reut.rs/3UNxG73

item.title: Breakingviews - 沃尔玛收购电视门户网站，但却无处可去
item.description: Breakingviews - Walmart buys TV portal to nowhere reut.rs/42Phfcc reut.rs/42Phfcc

item.title: 中国大幅下调抵押贷款基准参考利率，这是中国政府加大力度振兴房地产市场和经济的一个强烈信号。更多信息
item.description: China made a big cut to its benchmark reference rate for mortgages in a powerful signal authorities are ramping up efforts to revive the property market and economy. Read more: reut.rs/42JhoxS

item.title: 花旗集团首席执行官简-弗雷泽 2023 年薪酬增至 2,600 万美元
item.description: Citigroup lifts CEO Jane Fraser's 2023 pay to $26 mln reut.rs/48lUWw1

item.title: 汉莎航空再次面临罢工。这家德国航空公司的地勤人员罢工。这是他们本月以来的第二次罢工，同时也增加了工资谈判的压力。罢工将持续到周三早些时候，超过 100,000 名乘客将受到影响。
item.description: Lufthansa faces yet another strike. Ground staff at the German airline walked off the job. It’s their second strike just this month and raises the pressure in wage talks. Over 100,000 passengers will be hit by the stoppage, which runs until early Wednesday reut.rs/3I65cxN

item.title: 观看：✈️ 来自 50 多个国家的 1000 多家公司参加了两年一度的以商业和国防为重点的新加坡航展，其中包括空中客车公司、波音公司、洛克希德-马丁公司以及中国商飞和中航工业等中国竞争对手。
item.description: WATCH: ✈️ More than a 1,000 companies from more than 50 countries are participating in the biennial commercial and defense-focused Singapore Airshow, led by Airbus, Boeing and Lockheed Martin and their Chinese competitors such as COMAC and AVIC reut.rs/3UPVUgX

item.title: 卖空者对德国储蓄银行的押注创历史新高
item.description: Short-seller bets against Germany's Deutsche Pfandbriefbank hit all-time high reut.rs/49EmaiA

item.title: 意大利接管安赛乐米塔尔钢铁厂
item.description: Italy takes over running of ArcelorMittal's steelworks reut.rs/3T4AHyq

item.title: 德国为未来绿色氢气进口预留高达 38 亿美元的专项资金
item.description: Germany earmarks up to $3.8 bln for future green hydrogen imports reut.rs/42McTme

item.title: 观看：沃尔玛公布了截至 1 月底的第四季度强劲的利润和销售业绩，并证实了将以 23 亿美元收购智能电视制造商 Vizio 的报道。
item.description: WATCH: Walmart reported strong profit and sales in its fourth quarter, ending in late January, and confirmed a report that it would buy smart-TV maker Vizio for $2.3 billion reut.rs/3I79ZyY

item.title: 观看：昆巴铁矿公司（Kumba Iron Ore）宣布计划裁减约490个工作岗位后，股价下跌超过5%。
item.description: WATCH: Kumba Iron Ore shares fell more than 5% after it announced plans to cut about 490 jobs, following a reduction in production as it struggles to overcome South Africa's persistent rail bottlenecks reut.rs/4bFEedT

item.title: 葡萄牙造纸商 Navigator 第四季度利润下滑 39%，原因是需求和价格下降
item.description: Portuguese paper maker Navigator's Q4 profit slumps 39% on lower demand, prices reut.rs/3UNiXch

item.title: 观看：沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）支持的 Capital One 计划收购信用卡发行商发现金融服务公司（Discover Financial Services），这是美国最大的两家信用卡公司的合并交易，全股票交易价值 353 亿美元。
item.description: WATCH: In a deal combining two of the largest credit card companies in the US, Warren Buffett-backed Capital One plans to acquire credit card issuer Discover Financial Services in an all-stock transaction valued at $35.3 billion reut.rs/3wxqS3a

item.title: 意大利 Intrum 公司任命前麦肯锡顾问 Risso 为首席执行官
item.description: Intrum Italy names former McKinsey consultant Risso as CEO reut.rs/42OXFx6

item.title: 巴克莱银行描绘了通往更简单、更强大未来的不确定路线
item.description: Barclays maps uncertain route to a simpler, stronger future reut.rs/49nasZO

item.title: 观看：巴克莱银行（Barclays）正在努力重振其陷入困境的股价。该银行制定了重大计划，包括削减超过 20 亿美元的成本目标
item.description: WATCH: Barclays is on a mission to revive its struggling share price. The bank laid out major plans, including a cost-cut target of more than $2 billion reut.rs/49lix1g

item.title: Ancora 领导的集团希望诺福克南方公司任命新的首席执行官和首席运营官，并提名董事会新成员
item.description: Ancora-led group wants new CEO, COO at Norfolk Southern; nominates new members to board reut.rs/3PdstC7

item.title: 威尔-史密斯支持的 Arc 公司推出大众化电动运动艇，售价 25.8 万美元
item.description: Will Smith-backed Arc launches mass-market electric sport boat for $258,000 reut.rs/3UK48XW

item.title: 中国正在采取戏剧性的行动来支撑其萎靡不振的房地产行业，该国对基准抵押贷款利率进行了有史以来最大的一次下调。五年期贷款最优惠利率下调了 25 个基点，降至 3.95%。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: China is taking dramatic action to prop up its ailing property sector, the country did the biggest ever reduction in its benchmark mortgage rate. The five-year loan prime rate was slashed by 25 basis points to 3.95%. More here: reut.rs/42JhoxS

item.title: 股价下跌后，投资者提名 Fossil 集团董事候选人
item.description: Investor names director candidates at Fossil Group after stock price drop reut.rs/3SOOvfm

item.title: 股价下跌后，投资者提名 Fossil 集团董事候选人
item.description: Investor names director candidates at Fossil Group after stock price drop reut.rs/3I71xjb

item.title: 德国汉莎航空公司（Lufthansa）的地勤人员在主要机场罢工，这是他们本月的第二次罢工，增加了将于周三继续进行的工资谈判的压力，并加剧了该国冬季的劳工动荡。更多信息
item.description: Ground staff at German airline Lufthansa walked off the job at major airports in their second strike this month, raising pressure in wage talks due to continue on Wednesday and adding to a winter of labor unrest in the country. Read more: reut.rs/3I65cxN

item.title: 多伦多证券交易所（TSX）表现低迷，原因是全球降息押注减弱，超过了有利的加拿大 CPI
item.description: TSX muted as waning global rate cut bets outweigh favourable Canada CPI reut.rs/48oA6fm

item.title: 观看：✈️ 新加坡为亚洲最大的航空业盛会拉开帷幕，中国商飞和波音飞机订单纷至沓来，在供应严重紧张的情况下，航空业正努力应对健康危机后旅游需求的反弹。
item.description: WATCH: ✈️ Singapore kicked off Asia's biggest aviation gathering with orders for China's COMAC and Boeing planes as the industry grapples with a rebound in post-health crisis travel demand in the face of severe supply constraints reut.rs/3UPVUgX

item.title: 看：美国股票期权市场的交易员们押注，英伟达（Nvidia）即将发布的财报可能会刺激这家全球最主要的人工智能芯片制造商的股价大幅波动。Gradient Investments公司的Keith Gangl表示，投资者应将其视为买入机会。
item.description: WATCH: Traders in the US equity options market are betting Nvidia's upcoming earnings report could spur a massive move in the shares of the world's most dominant AI chipmaker. Keith Gangl of Gradient Investments says investors should take it as a buying opportunity

item.title: 卖空者对德国储蓄银行的押注创历史新高
item.description: Short-seller bets against Germany's Deutsche Pfandbriefbank hit all-time high reut.rs/4bIXMOu

item.title: 意大利任命特别专员管理安赛乐米塔尔工厂
item.description: Italy appoints special commissioner to run ArcelorMittal plants reut.rs/49xESbE

item.title: 极光大麻任命前百时美施贵宝高管为首席财务官
item.description: Aurora Cannabis names former Bristol Myers executive as CFO reut.rs/48qjdkL

item.title: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）旗下的昆巴铁矿公司（Kumba Iron Ore）在努力克服南非持续存在的铁路瓶颈问题并将足够的产量运往港口后表示，计划削减约490个工作岗位。更多信息
item.description: Anglo American Plc's Kumba Iron Ore plans to cut about 490 jobs, it said after reducing production as it struggles to overcome South Africa's persistent rail bottlenecks and move sufficient volumes to ports. Read more: reut.rs/4bFEedT
